SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID here in the box below

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put your Number and name for Owner

owner_react_emojie.description: put one emojie for owner reacts

MODE.description: choose bot mode public or private

PREFIX.description: put any one symbol here leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

ANTI_LINK.description: it will dlt links and kick user

AutoReaction.description: make it true to react on chats

autoreactions_emojies.description: put your favourite emojies for AutoReactions on chats or make it empty for all default emojies

STATUSVIEW.description: make it true to auto view status and likes

StatusEmojies.description: Add your favorites emojies for status likes

STATUS_MSG.value: Your Status has been seen by Prince bot
